items.name: Tostada con Tomate Fresco y Aceite de Oliva Extra Virgen
items.description: Toast with tomato, garlic and extra virgin olive oil. OPTIONAL Top Serrano Ham for £3.50

items.name: Huevos Rotos (GF)
items.description: Spanish Broken Eggs & Chips. OPTIONAL Top Chorizo (£3.50), Serrano Ham (£3.50) or Mixed Vegetables (£2.50)

items.name: Torrijas
items.description: Spanish style toast or describe them as fried bread pudding, with sugar, cinnamon and fresh fruit. OPTIONAL Add Scoop of Ice Cream for £1.75

items.name: Full English Breakfast (Vegetarian option available) (GF)
items.description: Smoked Bacon Rashers, Lincolnshire or Pork Leek Sausage, Choice of Fried or Poached or Scrambled Egg with Hash brown, Flat Cup Mushroom and Homemade Beans. Choose from sliced white or wholemeal (toasted or fried)

items.name: Bar Dos English (GF)
items.description: A smaller portion for those with a lesser appetite

items.name: Posh Scrambled Eggs
items.description: Scrambled with crème fraiche, chives, on a wholemeal doorstop, served with griddled tomato and flat cap mushroom

items.name: Posh Poached Eggs
items.description: Free range eggs on toasted crumpets, accompanied by hollandaise sauce, served with griddled tomato and flat cap mushroom

items.name: Huevos Rancheros – The Latin Classic
items.description: Three fried egg on flour tortillas, covered in Dos Hermanos salsa and shavings of red Leicester cheese

items.name: Extras
items.description: Jamon Serrano (£3.50), Spinach (£2.50), Sliced Avocado (£2.50), Smoked Salmon (£3.50), Slice Toast (£1.00), Bacon (£1.50), Hash Brown (£1.00), Baked Beans (£1.50)

items.name: Accompaniments
items.description: Chunky Chips (Plain) £3.00 | With Red Leicester Cheese and Jalapenos £3.50 | With garlic butter and Cajun seasoning £3.50

items.name: Omelette (GF)
items.description: Choose any two fillings: Mushrooms OR Jamon Serrano OR Red Leicester cheese OR Spinach OR tomato & onion (extra fillings 1.25 each). Served with choice of brown or white toast

items.name: Poached Egg, Avocado & Salsa Bruchetta
items.description: Toasted Sourdough, topped with our homemade salsa, fresh sliced avocado and free range poached egg

items.name: Shakshuka (GF)
items.description: Three free range poached egg in tomato, onion, peppers, zucchini and garlic sauce, spiced with cumin, coriander, paprika and cayenne, topped with feta cheese, cooked and served in an iron skillet

items.name: French Toast (or 'Eggy Bread')
items.description: We make ours with a thick sliced 'door stop', with butter and maple syrup

items.name: Breakfast Burrito
items.description: Filled with scrambled egg, sausage, cheese and bacon (or mixed vegetables for vegetarian) served with refined beans and seasoned rice, topped with salsa, guacamole and sour cream

items.name: Pancakes
items.description: With bacon rashers & maple syrup OR with maple syrup only

items.name: Vegetarian or Chicken Fajita
items.description: Served in sizzling skillet on a bed of onions, peppers, salsa, guacamole, sour cream, cheese and flour tortilla

items.name: Teas from English Garden (English Breakfast, Decaf Tea, Earl Grey, Herbal/Fruit, Peppermint, Camomile, Green Tea)
Bloody Mary
items.description: Tomato Juice, Lemon Juice, Tio Pepe Fino Sherry, Tabasco and Worcester sauce, seasoned with celery salt, fresh ground pepper and garnished with celery

items.name: Virgin Mary
items.description: Tomato Juice, Lemon Juice, Tio Pepe Fino Sherry, Tabasco and Worcester sauce, seasoned with celery salt, fresh ground pepper and garnished with celery
